title: How to start this type of blog - Quora

response.answer_text: It is very easy : They are using blogger by google which is a free blogger platform and a free customised template. You need to sign up for blogger. I would like to help you . You can follow the tutorials on my website and follow my space and you will be able to make a blog even better . It will only take 8 to 10 hrs only Would you please like to join my Quora space Billion Blogger Questions (Billion Blogger Questions) .This space is completely dedicated to bloggers and questions are answered within an hour. Thanks !
